body.description: The product is refurbished and is fully functional. Backed by the 90-day Amazon Renewed Guarantee. - This pre-owned product has been professionally inspected, tested and cleaned by Amazon qualified vendors. - Products correspond to one of the following cosmetic conditions: Excellent condition - no signs of cosmetic damage when held 12 inches away. Good condition - Light scratches, barely visible when holding the device 12 inches away. Acceptable condition - Scratches visible when holding the device 12 inches away and perceptible to the touch. - This product will have a battery that exceeds 80% capacity relative to new. - Accessories may not be original, but will be compatible and fully functional. Product may come in generic box. - This product is eligible for a replacement or refund within 90 days of receipt if it does not work as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice feeling backlit keyboard and clear bright screen with extremely fast WiFi
reviews.reviewText: I own a fleet of computers. Several Macs, several PCs, and several Chromebooks. They all have different purposes. Macs for music and video production; PCs mostly for work; Chromebooks for browsing the internet, checking email, etc. But in the short time I've had this $200 machine, I've been blown away by the key features. I write for a living so a good keyboard is critical for typing. This is hands down the best keyboard I've ever used on a Chromebook. Just the right amount of resistance an a great feel. Plus backlighting, which was not a key for me but nice to have. The screen, which is the second most important part of the laptop for me, is crisp and bright. The whole package is lightweight but feels sturdy, and the battery life is excellent. Given that my work has migrated everything to the cloud, I'm using this Chromebook for everything (except video and music production -- nothing better than a Mac for that stuff) and just really pleased with this purchase. Mine was refurbished but there is no indication anywhere of any problems at all -- looks and works like new. The review asked me to describe the touch screen -- but this model doesn't have a touch screen. That's fine with me as I don't like fingerprints on my screen anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bang for your buck!
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't believe all of the high end features for under two hundred bucks. Works well and looks great. Speakers are very good. USB-C charger that works on either side. Camera. Backlit keyboard. >3G processor. Bluetooth. What more can I say?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A very good overall computer at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at how good this unit works. First, cosmetically it looks as if it is brand new. Not a blemish on it. Second, I was very pleased at how good the display is for this price. My last Chromebook had an abysmal display. Thirdly it came up and worked as it should right off the bat. Now I have only been using it for a few days but that is a good indication. The keyboard is great or my fat fingers. I love the fact that the keyboard is backlit. It isn't blazing fast, but it is quite responsive and a pleasure to use. Battery life seems to be about 12 hours or so which works well for me. I had no trouble connecting to my router and getting on the internet. So, I am very pleased at this point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a chirstmas gift for my wife from the reviews I was a bit skeptical but iv had no issues. Iv actually almost taken it over lol 😆 I'm probably gonna have to buy a second one for myself lol.It's not slow I think it works and processes at a very normal speed. Works just as good as my galaxy s23. But obviously more capable. Works great for all my trucking load boreds and ect.. I will most likely buy another. I will say it's not steel or anything don't set anything on top of it. Don't leave it plugged 24/7

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this is my third Chrome and the best one so far, faster than my others , lighter and great for what I needed for, excellent choice and purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a quality laptop, loads quick and very responsive. I would recommend this laptop to a student or someone who just needs to connect to the internet and do lightweight work remotely.It is not a laptop for graphic intensive, gaming or heavy duty computing, but it is a good working computer for students, teachers or staff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No longer working
reviews.reviewText: I bought this over the summer used barely other than zoom and the screen is not working. Unable to contact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent product for its price.
reviews.reviewText: So far (4 days in) Chromebook has been working fine. Screen quality is not the best but thats compared to $1000+ products. Audio is just fine doesn't over heat or anything, would buy it again.
